task.summary: url root fix to show articles
to make sure all chages are uploaded since last commit. probably was about ui
user feature enabled, templates for it have been created. article-tags m2m field moved to TagsRecord model, to save who saved it

two net items added to TODO. basic user features of django implemented. login, logout, password change, user profile templates have been added. TagRecord model created, as intermediary model between Tag and Article2.
ui improvement on header. hamburger icon fixed.
Turkish categories fix, it was showing all the tags.
build failed due to a static file (/images/remove_icon.svg). installed and configured whitenoise because of this
